content: Creatures of power, creatures of grade, creatures of beauty, creatures of strength. As for their lives, they set everything's pace. For all things must come to live. Under their emerald embraceEither in their life or in their death.

I'm not sure I understand what you're asking for here. It sounds like you're describing some kind of poetic or philosophical concept, but could you please clarify what exactly you need assistance with? I'm here to help, but I need a bit more information to do so effectively.
